name: 杰森·加德纳
birth_place: 澳大利亚,维多利亚,墨尔本

last_movies.title: 花樣冰舞 第十一季
Bring on the Bling: Academy Awards 2005
伟大的表演 第一季

introduction: Trained: National School of Ballet and Broadway Dance. He started dancing at age 20..Theatre: Dick in Dames at Sea (Ambassadors), Riff in West Side Story (Australian production and Jetensemble in the US national tour), original Australian cast of 42nd Street, Kismet (Jackie Gleeson Theatre, Miami), My Fair Lady (Victorian State Opera, Melbourne), understudied and played Munkustrap, Rum Tum Tugger and Alonzo in Cats in London, Oklahoma! (Royal National Theatre), Aaron in the UK production of Chicago and the role of Bertie Basset in Gershwin's Lady Be Good (La Fenice Opera House, Venice)..Television/Film: Surviving Picasso (Merchant Ivory Productions), Simply Red at the Brit Awards, Bjork for Smash Hits Awards and Top of the Pops, Destiny's Child for the MTV Awards. Performed the role of Alonzo in the Cats video (Really Useful Films), The Centennial Gershwin Concert (London Palladium), Steve Coogan's Christmas Special (BBC) and The Prince's Trust Concert live (Royal Albert Hall).PS：总觉得他在《猫》里的角色Alonzo 就是他本人的性格……一模一样的骄傲，在做Dancing on ice的评委时更是把骄傲毒舌本性发挥到极致= =
